title: Designing Online/Blended Science Classes Using AI-Enhanced Workflows

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic science pedagogy and use of online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Strengthening science lesson design competencies using AI tools for pre-service/in-service elementary teachers.

learning_goals: Participants can design science-subject-specific personalized learning materials using AI-based content creation tools
Participants can develop lesson plans applying AI-enhanced workflows in blended learning environments
Participants can evaluate the pedagogical appropriateness and ethical considerations of AI-generated content
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
